Our fleet

Book a ride now

Scroll to learn more

Comfort comes in different sizes

Compact

Up to 3 passengers

Compact is our smallest vehicle size. We typically use Mercedes E-350s in the compact class. It is exceptionally luxurious and exceptionally comfortable. This vehicle has a maximum capacity of 3 passengers.

See more pictures

Standard

Up to 7 passengers

We typically use a Chevrolet Suburban SUV as our standard vehicle. It is a very comfortable and spacious vehicle. It can handle up to 7 passengers comfortably and carry more luggage than our compact vehicles.

See more pictures

Large

Up to 11 passengers

In our large class of vehicles, we use Mercedes Sprinter vans. This vehicle is both spacious and luxurious. This van can carry up to 11 passengers comfortably, and has plenty of room for luggage.

See more pictures

Standard

Up to 14 passengers

For our super vehicle class, we use Ford Transit vans. These vans are our largest vehicles and are perfect for larger families or tour groups. It has plenty of space for both passengers and luggage, maxing out at 14 passengers.

See more pictures

Book A Ride With Us

Ready to book a ride for your next trip to Orlando? You can book your ride online using our online booking system. You will be able to complete the entire booking process online so that when it’s time for your ride its effortless.

Book Now
